question: Zachary did 35 push-ups and 3 crunches in gym class today. David did 58 more push-ups but 87 less crunches than zachary. How many more push-ups than crunches did Zachary do?
response:
Zachary did 35 push-ups and 3 crunches, so he did 35 + 3 = 38 push-ups.
David did 58 more push-ups than Zachary, so he did 58 + 38 = 96 push-ups.
David did 87 less crunches than Zachary, so he did 38 - 87 = -50 crunches.
Since Zachary did 38 push-ups and David did 96 push-ups, Zachary did 38 - 96 = -58 push-ups.
Since Zachary did -58 push-ups and David did -50 crunches, Zachary did more push-ups than crunches by 8 push-ups.
The answer is Zachary did 8 more push-ups than crunches.
